version_description:
What's New in 1.1.3

New Adventure Time mash-up with all your favorite characters, the Land of Ooo, a bespoke texture set, and original soundtrack!

What's new in version 1.1.4:

Three skin packs for your adventures! Check out the new Battles & Beasts, Cyber Space, and Pet Skin Packs.

What's new in version 1.1.5?

Create your own Industrial Revolution with the new Victorian-inspired Steampunk Texture Pack!
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed clock and compass textures becoming corrupted after reconnecting to world with a resource pack.
1.1.7: This build supports iPV6.

What's new in version 1.2?

Cross-platform play for up to eight players across Windows 10 PCs, Android devices, iOS phones and tablets, Xbox One, and virtual reality platforms.

Massive online multiplayer servers! We've added a server browser to the main menu so you can socialize, play, and collaborate with millions of other players.

Loads of new features, including parrots, stained glass, banners, armor stands, fireworks (with Elytra boost), ravines, recipe book, book and quill, jukebox, discs, zombie villager spawn egg and also COARSE DIRT!
New world starting options: Starting Map, Bonus Chest, and Trust Players.
New game rules: TNT Explores & Natural Regeneration
World conversion to bring over your worlds from other versions
Player permissions, in-game host options, new loading screens with funny and helpful tips and a How To Play screen.
Remix 3D and structure blocks

What's new in version 1.2?
Cross-platform play for up to eight players across Windows 10 PCs, Android devices, iOS phones and tablets, Xbox One, and virtual reality platforms.
Massive online multiplayer servers! We've added a server browser to the main menu so you can socialize, play, and collaborate with millions of other players.
Loads of new features, including parrots, stained glass, banners, armor stands, fireworks (with Elytra boost), ravines, recipe book, book and quill, jukebox, discs, zombie villager spawn egg and also COARSE DIRT!

World conversion to bring over your worlds from other versions

Remix 3D and structure blocks

1.2.2 版全新内容：
修复各种错误

版本 1.2 中有哪些新增功能？
跨 Windows 10 PC、iOS 手机和平板电脑、Xbox One 和虚拟现实平台的跨平台游戏最多支持 8 位玩家同玩。
大型在线多人游戏服务器！我们已在主菜单中添加服务器浏览器，以便您可以与数百万其他玩家进行社交、一起打游戏以及进行协作。
许多新功能，包括鹦鹉、染色玻璃、旗帜、盔甲架、焰火（带翅鞘提升）、峡谷、卷轴书、书和羽毛、唱片机、唱片、僵尸村民刷怪蛋以及粗粒土！
全新启动选项：初始地图、奖励箱子和信任玩家。
游戏新规则：TNT 爆炸和自然生命恢复
世界转换为从其他版本引入您的世界
玩家权限、游戏内主机选项、新的加载屏幕，带有有趣且有用提示以及游戏指南屏幕。
混合 3D 和结构方块

Various bug fixes

What's new in version 1.2.5?

New ways to stream! For every Minecraft command, you can create an interactive button and let your viewers play along with you on Mixer.
Stream directly from the game with Mixer!

What's new in version 1.2.7?

Celebrate the 12 days of Minecraft! From December 21 through January 1, visit the Minecraft marketplace to snag a daily free gift and explore the rest of the new holiday content. But hurry – each free gift is only available for 24 hours!

What's new in version 1.4?

Aquatic features are beginning to swim into Minecraft!
Catch all the new fish, including pufferfish, tropical fish, cod and salmon. Put them in a bucket!
Brave the ocean depths with the trident, and enchant it with special powers!
Explore nine ocean biomes full of kelp, icebergs, blue ice, coral, sea grass and the illustrious sea pickle!
Improved animations – now you can swim and actually look like you're swimming!
Find underwater ravines and caves. Discover shipwrecks and ruins!
You might even find treasure maps, treasure chests, buried treasure, or the Heart of the Sea!

What's new in version 1.5?

The Update Aquatic is here!

Turtles and baby turtles! Collect Scutes dropped by baby turtles shedding their shells to craft a Turtle Shell Helmet!

Watch out for the new hostile mob: The Drowned!

Collect nautilus shells and craft the elusive Conduit to afford you special underwater powers!

Bubble columns to whisk you to and from the ocean floor!

Dolphins will help you find shipwrecks if you feed them fish!

1.8 版全新内容：
熊猫们现在会在丛林里生成了，它们会在那里嬉闹、休憩和懒洋洋地四处晃悠！
拜访一个村庄，和好奇的流浪猫做朋友，它们会成为很好的宠物，同时还会吓走恐怖的幻影。
储备全新的竹子来搭建脚手架（建东西变得更快、更安全、更整洁了！），或者把竹子喂给一直吃个不停嘴的熊猫。
您最喜欢的市场内容现已推出同捆包，让您花得更少：现在您只需点击一下，即可获得北欧、埃及、中国和希腊神话混搭包！

版本 1.9 中新增功能:
可爱的新花卉：铃兰和矢车菊！
20 余种新的阶梯、台阶和墙，让您尽情享受建造的乐趣！

1.10 版本中有哪些新增功能？

新的方块！灯、织布机、讲台和带树皮的木头方块！
使用新的弩和护盾武装您自己！
由玩家投票选出得以进入游戏的全新猫皮肤——果冻！
在创造模式中偷袭新的敌方劫掠者
新的香草材质

1.11 版本中有哪些新增功能？

修订后的村庄！发现带有工作地点、建筑、设计和施工机会的跨越了不同生物群系的新村庄。
赢得村民的信任，探索完善的交易体系，用全新的方式交换物品！
可怕的新威胁！劫掠者的前哨正在主世界的各地出现，为他们的进攻做准备。你准备好反击了吗？
新的生物！狐狸和破坏者进入了《我的世界》！
保卫村庄！当钟声响起，刌民和劫掠者就要开始攻击了。用新的弩和护盾建立强大的防御并武装您自己！

修订后的村庄！发现带有工作地点、建筑、设计和施工机会的跨越了不同生物群系的新村庄。

1.13 版全新内容：
本次更新带来了技术补充、角色创建器以及狐狸！狐狸出没于针叶林和冰雪生物群系。角色创建器是一项能够让您个性化自己外观的额外方式。我们还修复了若干漏洞和一些性能问题。

版本 1.14 中有哪些新增功能？
蜜蜂们正在嗡嗡地飞进《我的世界》！
这些新生物生产的蜂蜜可以用来做蜂蜜方块，并且蜜蜂可以帮助农作物更快地生长。我们还修复了错误和性能问题。

1.17 版全新内容：

深入了解洞穴及悬崖更新的第一部分，认识有趣的生物、方块和物品！在水下与美西螈合作，让自己沐浴在发光鱿鱼的光芒下。当您身处高地时，要格外小心，因为山羊可能会向您冲来！想建立一个随时间变化的居所吗？开采铜矿，用它来进行建造，见证建筑物在岁月流逝中的变化。

1.17.2 版全新内容：
修复各种错误
